author: trawick
msg: OS/390 doesn't have ranlib and its make utility thinks RANLIB=:
is a rule, so set RANLIB to true if there is no ranlib.

author: bjh
msg: Fix PCRE build on OS/2. This includes taking libtool out of the picture,

author: trawick
msg: EBCDIC bug fix: do the required translation handle initialization
so that ap_MD5Encode() can translate properly

author: trawick
msg: APR-ize the CHARSET_EBCDIC support in ap_base64encode() and
ap_base64decode().  The app (e.g., Apache, ab) must call a function
